properties.name: spring.cloud.governance.routing.rule
properties.description: LoadBalance rule for label routing, the following values are included: RoundRobinRule, RandomRule, WeightedResponseTimeRule, BestAvailableRule, RetryRule, ZoneAvoidanceRule, AvailabilityFilteringRule.

properties.name: spring.cloud.governance.routing.zone.affinity.enabled
properties.description: Whether strategy zone avoidance rul is enabled.

properties.name: spring.cloud.governance.routing.feign.core.header.transmission.enabled
properties.description: Whether strategy feign core header transmission is enabled.

properties.name: spring.cloud.governance.routing.rest.core.header.transmission.enabled
properties.description: Whether strategy rest template core header transmission is enabled.

properties.name: spring.cloud.governance.routing.web.client.core.header.transmission.enabled
properties.description: Whether strategy web client core header transmission is enabled.

properties.name: spring.cloud.governance.routing.service.header.priority
properties.description: Whether strategy service header priority is enabled.

properties.name: spring.cloud.governance.routing.gateway.header.priority
properties.description: Whether strategy gateway header priority is enabled.

properties.name: spring.cloud.governance.routing.zuul.header.priority
properties.description: Whether strategy zuul header priority is enabled.
